item.title: 6. Frequency Response
item.description:
General Considerations

Miller’s Law

$$ \begin{aligned} Z_1 &= \frac{1}{1-A} Z \\ Z_2 &= \frac{1}{1 - \dfrac{1}{A}}Z \\\ \\ In \ this \ case \\ Z_1 &= \frac{1}{s(1 + A)C_F} \\ \therefore C_{in} &= (1+A)C_F \\ Method \ II \\ Q_{in} &= C_F(-A\Delta V - \Delta V) \\ &= -(1+A)C_F\Delta V \\ \therefore C_{in} &= (1+A) C_F \end{aligned} $$

Association of Poles with Nodes

General Case

$$ \begin{aligned} H(s) &= \frac{V_{out}}{V_{in}}(s) \\ &= \frac{A_1}{1 + sR_SC_{in}} \frac{A_2}{1 + sR_1 C_N}\frac{1}{1 + sR_2C_P} \end{aligned} $$

Input Example

$$ \begin{aligned} Input \ Impedence \ Z_{in} &= (1+A) C_F \\ f_p &= \frac{1}{(1+A)R_SC_F} \end{aligned} $$

Common-Source Stage

Input/Output Frequency

$$ \begin{aligned} X \ to \ ground \\ Z_X &= C_{GS} + (1-A)C_{GD} \\ \omega_{in} &= \frac{1}{R_S [C_{GS} + (1 + g_mR_D)C_{GD}]} \\ V_{out} \ to \ ground \\ Z_X &= C_{DB} + (1-A^{-1})C_{GD} \\ &\approx C_{DB} + C_{GD} \\ \therefore \omega_{out} &= \frac{1}{R_S(C_{GS} + C_{GD})} \end{aligned} $$

$R_S$ is large

$$ \begin{aligned} Z_X &= \frac{1}{sC_{eq}} || ( \frac{C_{GD} + C_{GS}}{C_{GD}} \frac{1}{g_m}) (???) \\ \therefore \omega_{out} &= \frac{1}{\Big[ R_D || \Big(\dfrac{C_{GD} + C_{GS}}{C_{GD}} \dfrac{1}{g_m}\Big) \Big] (C_{eq} + C_{DB})} \\ \therefore \frac{V_{out}}{V_{in}}(s) &= -\frac{g_mR_D}{(1 + \dfrac{s}{\omega_{in}}) (1 + \dfrac{s}{\omega_{out}})} \end{aligned} $$

Exact Transfer Function

$$ \begin{aligned} KCL: \\ 0 &= V_X sC_{GS} + (V_X - V_{in})/R_S + (V_X - V_{out})sC_{GD} \\ 0 &= V_{out} (\frac{1}{R_D} + C_{DB}) + (V_{out} - V_X)sC_{GD} \\ \therefore \ H(s) &= \frac{V_{out}}{V_{in}} \\ &= \frac{(C_{GD}s - g_m)R_D}{R_SR_D\xi s^2 + [R_S(1+g_mR_D)C_{GD} + R_SC_{GS} + R_D(C_{GD} + C_{DB})]s + 1} \\ \xi = C_{GS}C_{GD} + C_{GS}C_{DB} + C_{GD}C_{DB} \\ Two \ Pole \ Systems: \\ D &= (1 + \frac{s}{\omega_{p1}})(1 + \frac{s}{\omega_{p2}}) \\ &= \frac{s^2}{\omega_{p1}\omega_{p2}} + (\frac{1}{\omega_{p1}} + \frac{1}{\omega_{p2}})s + 1 \\ \omega_{p2} &\gg \omega_{p1} \\ \therefore coefficient \ of \ s &\approx \frac{1}{\omega_{p1}} \\ \therefore \omega_{p1} &= \frac{1}{R_S(1+g_mR_D)C_{GD} + R_SC_{GS} + R_D(C_{GD} + C_{DB})} \end{aligned} $$

Source Followers

Transfer Function and Poles

$$ \begin{aligned} KCL: \\ V_1C_{GS}s + g_mV_1 &= V_{out}C_Ls \\ \therefore V_1 &= \frac{C_Ls}{g_m + C_{GS}s}V_{out} \\ KVL: \\ V_{in} &= R_S[V_1C_{GS}s + (V_1 + V_{out})C_{GD}s] + V_1 + V_{out} \\ \therefore \frac{V_{out}}{V_{in}}(s) &= \frac{g_m + C_{GS}s}{R_S\xi s^2 + (g_mR_SC_{GD} + C_L + C_{GS})s + g_m} \\ Poles: \\ \therefore \omega_{p1} &\approx \frac{g_m}{g_mR_SC_{GD} + C_L + C_{GS}} \\ &= \frac{1}{R_SC_{GD} + \dfrac{C_L + C_{GS}}{g_m}} \\ if \ R_S &= 0: \\ \omega_{p1} &= \frac{g_m}{C_L + C_{GS}} \end{aligned} $$

Input Impedence

  • $C_{GD}$ shunts the input, neglected.

$$ \begin{aligned} V_X &= \frac{I_X}{C_{GS}s} + (I_X + \frac{g_m I_X}{C_{GS}s}) (\frac{1}{g_{mb}} || \frac{1}{C_Ls}) \\ Z_{in} &= \frac{1}{C_{GS}s} + (1 + \frac{g_m}{C_{GS}s})\frac{1}{g_{mb} + C_L s} \\ Low \ Frequency: \\ g_{mb} &\gg |C_Ls| \\ \therefore Z_{in} &\approx \frac{1}{C_{GS}s}(1 + \frac{g_m}{g_{mb}}) + \frac{1}{g_{mb}} \end{aligned} $$

Common-Gate Stage

$$ \begin{aligned} \frac{V_{out}}{V_{in}}(s) &= \frac{(g_m + g_{mb})R_D}{1 + (g_m + g_{mb})R_S} \frac{1}{\Big(1 + \dfrac{C_S}{g_m + g_{mb} + \dfrac{1}{R_S}}s \Big) (1 + R_DC_D s)} \\ \therefore Z_{in} &\approx \frac{Z_L}{(g_m + g_{mb})r_o} + \frac{1}{g_m + g_{mb}} \\ Z_L &= R_D || [1/(C_D s)] \end{aligned} $$

item.title: 4. Differential Amplifiers
item.description:
Single-Ended Signal & Differential Signal

  1. CM-level: Center Voltage (图中的虚线)

Basic Differential Pair

  • 加上Bias Current Source for Reducing the Variation of CM level

Qualitative Analysis

  1. $V_{out} - V_{in}$ 图像

$$ \begin{aligned} V_{in1} - V_{in2} &\in (-\infin, + \infin) \end{aligned} $$

  • 横轴两头是其中一个MOSFET未打开的情况
  1. Other Characteristics

$$ \begin{aligned} 为了使M_3&工作在饱和区 \\ V_P &\ge V_{GS3} - V_{TH3} \\ V_{in,CM} - V_{GS1} &\ge V_{GS3} - V_{TH3} \\ \therefore V_{in,CM} &\ge V_{GS1} + V_{OV3} \\\ \\ 为了使M1,M2&工作在饱和区 \\ V_{DS1} &\ge V_{GS1} - V_{TH1} \\ \therefore V_{in,CM} &\le V_{out1} + V_{TH1} = V_{DD}- \frac{I_{SS}}{2} R_D + V_{TH1} \\\ \\ V_{GS1} + (V_{GS3} - V_{TH3} ) &\le V_{in,CM} \le min \Big[ V_{DD}-\frac{I_{SS}}{2}R_D + V_{TH1, V_{DD}} \Big] \end{aligned} $$

  1. $|A_v| - V_{in,CM}$ 图像

Quantitative Analysis

Differential Voltage Gain

  • 当$M_1$和$M_2$都工作在Satuartion Region时，有以下分析:

$$ \begin{aligned} V_{in1} - V_{in2} &= V_{G1} - V_{G2} \\ V_{GS} - V_t&= \sqrt{\frac{2I}{k_n}} \\ (V_{in1} - V_{in2})^2 &= \frac{2}{k_n} (I_{SS} - 2\sqrt{I_{D1} I_{D2}}) \\ \frac{1}{2}k_n(V_{in1} - V_{in2})^2 &= I_{SS} - 2\sqrt{I_{D1}I_{D2}} \\ 4I_{D1}I_{D2} &= (I_{D1} + I_{D2})^2 - (I_{D1} - I_{D2})^2 \\ &= I_{SS}^2 - (I_{D1} - I_{D2})^2 \\ \therefore (I_{D1} - I_{D2})^2 &= I_{SS}^2 - 4I_{D1}I_{D2} \\ &= I_{SS}^2 - (I_{SS} - \frac{1}{2}k_n(V_{in1} - V_{in2})^2)^2 \\ &= I_{SS}k_n(V_{in1} - V_{in2})^2 - \frac{1}{4}k_n^2(V_{in1} -V_{in2})^4 \\ \therefore I_{D1} - I_{D2} &= \frac{1}{2}k_n(V_{in1} - V_{in2})\sqrt{\frac{4I_{SS}}{k_n} - (V_{in1} - V_{in2})^2} \\ \therefore \Delta I_{D} &= \frac{1}{2} k_n\Delta V_{in} \sqrt{\frac{4I_{SS}}{k_n} - \Delta V_{in}^2} \\\ \\ \frac{\partial \Delta I_D}{\partial \Delta V_{in}} &= \frac{1}{2} k_n \dfrac{\dfrac{4I_{SS}}{k_n} - 2\Delta V_{in}^2}{\sqrt{\dfrac{4I_{SS}}{k_n} - \Delta V_{in}^2}} \\ 当\Delta V_{in} &= 0 时 \\ G_m &= \sqrt{k_nI_{SS}}\\ |A_v| &= \sqrt{k_nI_{SS}} R_D \\ 当 \Delta V_{in} &= \sqrt{\frac{2I_{SS}}{k_n}}时: \\ G_m &= 0 \\ V_{GS} &= \sqrt{\frac{I_{SS}}{k_n}} + V_T \\ 当\Delta V_{in} &= \sqrt{\frac{4I_{SS}}{k_n}}时: \\ G_m &= \infin, 显然不可能，原因是 \\ 此时的& M_1, M_2 已不在Satuartion \ Region 工作 \end{aligned} $$

Voltage Gain

  • 本图中，$M_1$与$M_2$相同，$R_{D1} = R_{D2}$

$$ \begin{aligned} \frac{V_X}{V_{in1}} &= -\frac{R_{D1}}{\dfrac{1}{g_{m1}} + \dfrac{1}{g_{m2}}} \\ \frac{V_Y}{V_{in1}} &= \frac{R_{D2}}{\dfrac{1}{g_{m1}} + \dfrac{1}{g_{m2}}} \\\ \\ A_v &=\frac{V_X - V_Y}{V_{in1} - V_{in2}} \\ &= -g_m R_D \end{aligned} $$

对于线性电路，$V_P$不变

  • 假设(a)图输入电压以图(b)所视方式变化

$$ \begin{aligned} 假设\Delta V_1 = V_a + \Delta V_1, \Delta V_2 &= V_a - \Delta V_2 \\ \because I_1 + I_2 &= I_T \\ \therefore g_m(\Delta V_1 + \Delta V_2) &= 0 \\ \therefore \Delta V_1 &= - \Delta V_2 \\\ \\ V_{in1} - V_1 &= V_{in2} - V_2 = V_P \\ V_{in1} + \Delta V_{in} - (V_a + \Delta V_1) &= V_{in2} - \Delta V_{in} - (V_a - \Delta V_2) \\ \therefore \Delta V_{in} &= \Delta V_1 \\ \therefore V_P不变 \end{aligned} $$

结论

图像

Commmon-Mode Response

$$ \begin{aligned} A_v &= \frac{\dfrac{R_D}{2}}{\dfrac{1}{2g_m} + R_{SS}} \\ A_{transconductance} &= \frac{g_m}{1 + 2g_m R_{SS}} \\\ \\ M_1 和 M_2 若不同 \\ V_P &= (g_{m1} + g_{m2})(V_{in,CM} - V_P)R_{ss} \\ \therefore V_P &= \frac{g_{m1} + g_{m2}}{1 + (g_{m1} + g_{m2})R_{SS}} R_{SS} \\ V_X &= g_{m1}R_D(V_{in,CM} - V_P) \\ &= \frac{-g_{m1}}{1 + (g_{m1} + g_{m2})R_{SS}}R_D V_{in,CM} \\ V_Y &= \frac{-g_{m2}}{1 + (g_{m1} + g_{m2})R_{SS}}R_D V_{in,CM} \\ \therefore A_{CM-DM} &= \frac{V_X - V_Y}{V_{in,CM}} \\ &= \frac{\Delta g_m R_D}{1 + (g_{m1} +g_{m2}) R_{SS})} \\ 将R_{SS} 替换为C_S \\ A_{CM-DM} &= \frac{\Delta g_m R_D}{\sqrt{1 + (g_{m1} + g_{m2})^2 \Big|\dfrac{1}{\omega C_S}\Big|^2} } \\ A_{DM} &= ??? \\ CMRR &= \frac{A_{DM}}{A_{CM-DM}} \\ &= \frac{g_m}{\Delta g_m}(1 + 2g_mR_{ss}) \\ 其中, g_m &= \frac{g_{m1} + g_{m2}}{2} \end{aligned} $$

Differential Pair With Diode-Connected and Commmon-Source Loads

item.title: 3. Single Stage Amplifier
item.description:
CS Stage

CS Stage With Resistive Load

图示

分析$A$和$V_{out}$

$$ V_{in} = V_{GS}, V_{out} = V_{DS} \\\ \\ V_{out} = \begin{cases} V_{DD} (没有压降) & V_{in} \lt V_t \\ V_{DD} -\frac{1}{2}k_n (V_{in} - V_t)^2 R_D & V_{in} \ge V_t \\ V_{in} - V_t & V_{in} - V_t = V_{out} \\ V_{DD} - \frac{1}{2} R_Dk_n[2(V_{in} - V_t)V_{out}- V_{out}^2] & Triode \ Region \end{cases} \\\ \\ 如果V_{in}很大, V_{out} \ll 2(V_{in} -V_t) \\\ \\ \begin{aligned} V_{out} &= \frac{R_{on}}{R_{on} + R_D}V_{DD} \\ &= \frac{V_{DD}}{1 + k_n R_D(V_{in} -V_t)} \\ ( R_{on} &= \frac{V_{out}}{i_D},i_D = k_nR_D(V_{in}-V_t)V_{out} ) \\\ \\ Saturation \ Gain: \\ A_v &= \frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}}\\ &= -g_m R_D \end{aligned} $$

Important Relations

Gain in Channel Length Modulation

$$ V_{out} = V_{DD} - \frac{1}{2}k_n(V_{in} - V_t)^2 (1 + \lambda V_{out})R_D \\\ \\ \begin{aligned} A_v &= \frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}}\\ &= - R_Dk_n (V_{in} - V_t)(1 + \lambda V_{out})- \frac{1}{2}k_n R_D(V_{in} - V_t)^2 \lambda\frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}} \\ &= -R_D g_m - I_DR_D \lambda A_v (近似) \\ &= -\frac{g_m R_D}{1 + R_D \lambda I_D} \\ &= -g_m \frac{r_0R_D}{r_0 + R_D} \end{aligned}$$

CS Stage With Diode-Connected Load

电路图

$$ V_1 = V_X \\\ \\ I_X = \frac{V_X}{r_0} + g_mV_X $$

测量电路

$$ \begin{aligned} Impedence: (\frac{1}{g_m} || r_0) &\approx \frac{1}{g_m} \\ V_1 &= V_{bs} = -V_X \\\ I_X &=\frac{V_X}{r_0} + (g_m + g_{mb})V_X \\ \frac{V_X}{I_X} &= \frac{1}{g_m+g_{mb}+r_0^{-1}} \\ &= \frac{1}{g_m + g_{mb}} || r_0 \\ & \approx \frac{1}{g_m +g_{mb}} \\ Z_{in} &\approx \frac{1}{g_m + g_{mb}} \end{aligned} $$

CS + Diode-Connected

Gain的推导 Method I

$$ \begin{aligned} A_v &= -g_{m1} \frac{1}{g_{m2} + g_{mb2}} \\ &= -\frac{g_{m1}}{g_{m2}}\frac{1}{1 + \eta} \\ &= \frac{\sqrt{2k_nI_{D1}}}{\sqrt{2k_nI_{D2}}}\frac{1}{1+\eta}(I_{D1} = I_{D2}) \\ &= -\sqrt{\frac{(W/L)1}{(W/L)2}}\frac{1}{1+\eta} \\ 其中, \eta&=\frac{g{mb2}}{g{m2}} = \frac{\partial V_{TH}}{\partial V_{out}}(???), 一般可以忽略不计 \end{aligned} $$

Gain的推导 Method II

$$ \begin{aligned} I_{D1} &= I_{D2} \\ \frac{1}{2}k_{n1}(V_{in} - V_{t1})^2 &= \frac{1}{2}k_{n2}(V_{DD} - V_{out} -V_{t2})^2 \\ \sqrt{(\frac{W}{L})1} (V{in} -V_{t1}) &= \sqrt{(\frac{W}{L})2}(V{DD} - V_{out} - V_{t2}) \\ 将V_{t2}当作变量，&对两边关于V_{in}求导\\ \sqrt{(\frac{W}{L})1} &= -\sqrt{(\frac{W}{L})2}(\frac{\partial V{out}}{\partial V{in}} - \frac{\partial V_{t2}}{\partial V_{in}}) \\ 其中, \frac{\partial V_{t2}}{\partial V_{in}} &= \frac{\partial V_{t2}}{\partial V_{out}} \frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}} = \eta\frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}} \\ \therefore A_v &= -\sqrt{\frac{(W/L)_1}{(W/L)_2}}\frac{1}{1+\eta} \\ &\approx -\sqrt{\frac{(W/L)_1}{(W/L)_2}} \end{aligned} $$

CS stage with diode-connected PMOS device

$$ \begin{aligned} I_{D1} & = I_{D2} \\ \therefore k_nV_{ovn}^2 &= k_pV_{ovp}^2 \\ \therefore \frac{\mu_n (W/L)n}{\mu_p(W/L)p} &= \frac{|V{ovp}|}{V{ovn}} \\ \therefore A_v &\approx -\frac{|V_{GS2} - V_{TH2}|}{V_{GS1} - V_{TH1}} \\ &\approx -\frac{k_n|V_{GS2} - V_{TH2}|}{V_{GS1} - V_{TH1}} \\ &\approx \frac{g_{mn}}{g_{mp}} \\ If \ CLM \ Considered \\ A_v &= -g_{m1} (\frac{1}{g_{m2}} || r_{o1} || r_{o2}) \end{aligned} $$

CS Stage With Current-Source Load

$$ \begin{aligned} A_v &= -g_m(r_{o1} || r_{o2}) \\ Intrinsic \ Gain: \ g_mr_o &= \sqrt{2(\frac{W}{L})\mu_nC_{OX}I_D} \frac{1}{\lambda I_D} \end{aligned} $$

CS Stage Woth Triode Load

$R_{on2} = \dfrac{1}{\mu_p C_{OX}(W/L)2(V{DD} -V-b-V_{Tp})}$

CS Stage With Source Degeneration

电路

分析

$$ 设I_D = f(V_{GS}) \\\ \\ \begin{aligned} G_m &= \frac{\partial I_D}{\partial V_{in}} \\ &= \frac{\partial f}{\partial V_{GS}}\frac{\partial V_{GS}}{\partial V_{in}} \\ &= g_m(\frac{ \partial (V_{in} - I_DR_S)}{\partial V_{in}}) \\ &= g_m (1-R_S\frac{\partial I_D}{\partial V_{in}}) \\ &= g_m(1 -R_SG_m) \\ \therefore G_m &= \frac{g_m}{1+g_mR_S} \\\ \\ \therefore A_v &= -G_m R_D \\ &= -\frac{g_mR_D}{1 + g_mR_S} \\ &= -\frac{R_D}{ \dfrac{1}{g_m}} \end{aligned} $$

小信号等效电路

  1. 电路

  1. 考虑CLM的分析

$$ \begin{aligned} I_{out} &= g_mV_1 - \frac{I_{out} R_S}{r_O} -g_mV_X \\ &= g_m (V_{in} - I_{out} R_S) - \frac{I_{out}R_S}{r_O} + g_m (-I_{out}R_S) \\ G_m &= \frac{I_{out}}{V_{in}} \\ &= \frac{g_mr_o}{R_S + [1 + (g_m + g_{mb})R_S]r_O} \end{aligned} \\\ $$

  1. 计算$R_{out}$

$$ \begin{aligned} I_{ro} &= I_X - g_m(V_1 + V_{bs}) \\ V_1 &= - I_XR_S \\ \therefore V_X &= I_{ro} r_o + I_X R_S \\ \therefore R_{out} &= \frac{V_X}{I_X} \\ &= R_S + [1 + (g_m + g_{mb}) R_S]r_o \end{aligned} $$

Source Follower (CD)

电路 电压特性

分析

$$ \begin{aligned} V_{out} &= \frac{1}{2}k_n(V_{in} -V_{out} -V_t) ^2 R_S \\ \frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}} &= k_n(V_{in}- V_{out} -V_t) (1 - \frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}} - \frac{\partial V_t}{\partial V_{in}}) R_S \\ \because \frac{\partial V_t}{\partial V_{in}} &= \eta \frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}} \\ \therefore \frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}} &= \frac{k_nV_{OV}R_S}{1+k_nV_{OV}R_S(1 +\eta)} \\ \because g_m &= k_nV_{OV} \\ \therefore A_v &= \frac{g_m R_S}{1 + (g_m + g_{mb}) R_S} \end{aligned} $$

Common-Gate Stage

电路

  • (a) 直接耦合

  • (b) 电容耦合

分析

$$ \begin{aligned} V_{out} &= V_{DD} - \frac{1}{2}k_n(V_b -V_{in} -V_t)^2R_D \\ \because \frac{\partial V_t}{\partial V_{in}} &= \frac{\partial V_t}{\partial V_{SB}} = \eta \\ \therefore A_v &= \frac{\partial V_{out}}{\partial V_{in}} \\ &= g_m(1+\eta) R_D \end{aligned} $$

Cascode Stage (D-S)

Basic Configuration

电路

  • $M_1$: Input Device

  • $M_2$: Cascode Device

分析

  • 为了让$M_1$和$M_2$都工作在饱和区，作出以下分析

$$ \begin{aligned} V_X &\ge V_{in} - V_{T1} \ (1) \\ V_b- V_{GS2} &= V_b - V_{G2} + V_{S2} \\ &= V_b -V_{G2} +V_X \\ \because V_b &= V_{G2} \\ \therefore V_X &= V_b - V_{GS2} \ (2) \\\ \\ 结合(1)(2) \\ V_b -V_{GS2} &\ge V_{in} -V_{T1} \\ V_b &\ge V_{in} - V_{T1} + V_{GS2} \ (3) \\\ \\ V_{out} - V_{S2} &\ge V_b - V_{S2} - V_{T2} \\ V_{out} &\ge V_b - V_{T2} (4)\\ \therefore 结合(3)(4) \\ V_{out} &\ge (V_{in} - V_{T1}+ V_{GS2} -V_{T2}) \\ \therefore V_{out \ min} &= V_{OV1} + V_{OV2} \end{aligned} $$

I/O 特性

Cascode Stage With Current-Source Load

Folded Cascode

三种电路

分析

$$ \begin{aligned} 对于b图(M_1 是 PMOS,M_2 是NMOS) \\ I_{D2} &= I_1 - \frac{1}{2} k_n(V_{DD} - V_{in} -|V_{T1}|)^2 \\ if \ I_{D2} &= 0 : \\ I_{D1} &= I_1 \\ &=\frac{1}{2}\mu_pC_{OX} (\frac{W}{L})1 (V{DD} - V_{in} - |V_{T1}|)^2 \\ \therefore V_{in1} &= V_{DD} -\sqrt{\frac{2I_1}{k_{p}}} -|V_{T1}| \\\ \\ If \ V_{in1} &\gt V_{DD} -\sqrt{\frac{2I_1}{k_{p}}} -|V_{T1}|: \\ \because I_{D1} &\le I_1 \\ \therefore M_1 &is \ in \ Triode \ Region \end{aligned} $$

Triode Region Resistance

We can approximate $R_{DS}$ as being equal to its maximum value, which is equal to $\dfrac{V_D}{I_D}$. This gives us an equivalent resistance of $R_{on} = \dfrac{V_D}{I_D}$.

MOSFET的电阻

  1. 输出电阻$\frac{1}{g_m}$

  2. 反向传输电阻$r_o$

  • 一般的, $r_o \gg \frac{1}{g_m}$

Body Effect
